full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 213 of 228 889 LC2VMAX6 Alessi - Direct your Honor. THE COURT: All right. So 2A is admitted. And then 2C through 2W is admitted under seal for the reasons indicated by Ms. Comey. (Government's Exhibits 2A, 2C through 2W received in evidence) MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. Ms. Drescher, would you please pull up 2A and publish it for the jury. Thank you. I'm told that the remaining exhibits are in a different set of binders that are not with the jury right now. So we'll publish the remaining exhibits at a later time and I'll move on to another topic. So we can take this down. THE COURT: Okay. BY MS. COMEY: Q. Mr. Alessi, what, if any, supplies were you instructed to buy for Mr. Epstein to use during his massages? A. I don't recall buying any oils or perfumes or whatever for the massages because they were purchased by Ms. Maxwell. MR. PAGLIUCA: Your Honor, I'm going to object to the narrative. I'm going to object to foundation. THE COURT: Okay. Q. If you didn't buy them, where did they come from? MR. PAGLIUCA: Objection. Foundation, your Honor. THE COURT: Sustained. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012498
